participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Calm and introspective, with a deep focus on spirituality.
participant_1.background: I like meditation. I live in Alaska. I quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. I'm a Buddhist. I have not spoken in three months.

participant_2.name: Ella
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and creative, with a passion for music and helping others.
participant_2.background: I volunteer at the homeless shelter. My father played violin professionally. I enjoy exploring new parts of the city. I am a piano teacher on the side. I play several instruments.

content.text: Hello, let's introduce ourselves, I am Mike, a musician
